name: 1.2.2.Final
body:
- [**closed**] Upgrade Quarkus to 1.3.3.Final [#580](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/580)
- [**closed**] Search should also search over ID [#573](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/573)
- [**Bug**] Remove deployment <skip>true</skip>for "distro" module [#563](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/563)
- [**Bug**] UI sends the wrong content-type for GraphQL files [#562](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/562)
- [**Bug**] Extra "schemaType" field (ccompat) [#552](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/552)
- [**Bug**] new versions of schema are created when schema hasn't changed when using ccompat endpoint [#551](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/551)
- [**Bug**] UI - search is case sensitive [#544](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/544)
- [**closed**] Confluent compatibility api - delete subject requires content-type header [#509](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/509)
- [**Bug**] Converter distribution no longer works with 1.2.0.Final [#500](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/500)
- [**Bug**] Fix possible race condition in search operation for in-memory storage [#499](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/499)
- [**Discussion**][**Enhancement**] UI functionality against Kafka/Streams back-ends [#488](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/488)
- [**Bug**] Search Artifacts - sorting should be by name (not working) [#485](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/485)
- [**Bug**] Updating artifact with type AVRO always fails [#476](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/476)
- [**closed**] Expose listening port as a param for the Docker images [#473](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/473)
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**] Better handling of "invalid content" errors in UI [#464](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/464)
- [**Bug**] Add createdOn metadata for each version of an artifact [#453](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/453)
- [**Bug**] NoClassDefFoundError exceptions registering schemas with apicurio-registry-maven-plugin [#417](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/417)
- [**Bug**] Fix a possible race condition in generating IDs in JPA storage [#369](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/369)
- [**closed**] Get All Artifacts: implement LIMIT for all storages [#328](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/328)
